Package com.blakfx.chat

Interface MessageCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConflatedMessageCacheInMemory, MessageCacheInMemory
    public interface MessageCache
    Interface for a Message Cache abstraction. Basically, keep track of a contact list, and their respective messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addContact​(String aContactName)
      Add a contact to the cache.
      boolean contactExists​(String aContactName)
      Check for whether a contact exists in the cache.
      Set<String> getActiveContacts()
      Get all the active contacts on the cache.
      List<String> getContactMessages​(String aContactName)
      Get all the messages associated with a given contact.
      boolean saveContactMessage​(String aContactName, String aMessage, boolean shouldPrint)
      Add a contact message, either a file notification or text content, to this contact cache.

    • Method Detail

      • addContact

        boolean addContact​(String aContactName)
        Add a contact to the cache.
        Parameters:
        aContactName - the name of the contact
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded or not

      • contactExists

        boolean contactExists​(String aContactName)
        Check for whether a contact exists in the cache.
        Parameters:
        aContactName - the name of the contact
        Returns:
        whether the contact exists or not

      • saveContactMessage

        boolean saveContactMessage​(String aContactName,
                           String aMessage,
                           boolean shouldPrint)
        Add a contact message, either a file notification or text content, to this contact cache.
        Parameters:
        aContactName - The contact associated with this message
        aMessage - The file notification or text content to add
        shouldPrint - Whether this add operation should be followed by a print of the cache
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded

      • getActiveContacts

        Set<String> getActiveContacts()
        Get all the active contacts on the cache.
        Returns:
        A set of strings with the contact names

      • getContactMessages

        List<String> getContactMessages​(String aContactName)
        Get all the messages associated with a given contact.
        Parameters:
        aContactName - the contact whose messages to get
        Returns:
        A list of strings of each message for this contact
